title: Dear Spooky Dude, Glenn WILL Expose You! | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Michelle Gray | 11/22/19
description:
Glenn is being called anti-Semitic YET AGAIN for calling George Soros a “puppet master.” But this is not conspiracy: We have his documents laying out the whole plan! Glenn’s sister Michelle Gray joins to discuss her new book, “Healthy Meals for All,” and how Glenn needs these lean and green meals. Bill O’Reilly calls in with the latest on corruption, impeachment, and multibillion-dollar companies lining up against Trump. And cable news is hitting new lows: CNN and MSNBC don’t tell the truth, and Fox News is directionless. Plus, is Greta Thunberg a time traveler? And 5G is NOT inherently dangerous! It’s necessary for the future.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
